title: Wazuh - System
description: System Dashboard offers a comprehensive summary of Wazuh events for services like SSHD, PAM, Windows, Syslog, FTPD, DPKG, YUM.

definition.content:
**Dashboard Overview**

System Dashboard offers a comprehensive summary of Wazuh events for services like SSHD, PAM, Windows, Syslog, FTPD, DPKG, YUM.

For more information, see the [Wazuh Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/wazuh/)

Tips:
 - Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
 - Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.
